definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: roebuck (Sam. [[יחמור]], Syr. h.amuwro0 Targum [[יַחְמוּרָא]] v. Hom:NS 392 (and 339), Lag:BN 127; name from reddish colour ?)—edible De 14:5, 1Ki 5:3; —on identif. with roebuck, v. Tristr:Proc. Zool. Soc. London, May 2, 1876 Conder:Tent Work, 1887, p.91.
